definition: angle/corner/horn/horn-shaped/unit of money equal to 0.1 yuan, or 10 cents (a dime)/CL:個|个[ge4]
role (theater)/to compete/ancient three legged wine vessel/third note of pentatonic scale

sentences.english: She had black hair, graying at the temples.
sentences.chinese: 她一頭黑髮，鬢角處開始變灰白了。

sentences.english: Objective To summary and introduce the method to reconstruct sideburns with expanded scalp flap.
sentences.chinese: 目的總結並介紹利用擴張頭皮瓣修復鬢角的方法。

sentences.english: Well, could you cut a little more off the temple?
sentences.chinese: 好，能不能把雙方鬢角再剪短些？

sentences.english: Well, I would like my haircut shorter on the temples.
sentences.chinese: 嗯，請把兩邊鬢角再剪短些。

sentences.english: B: Well, could you cut a little more off the temples?
sentences.chinese: 嗯，能不能把兩邊鬢角再剪短些？

sentences.english: NO10,5. Please don't cut off my sideburns.
Well, could you cut a little more off the temples?
sentences.chinese: 嗯，能不能把兩邊鬢角再剪短些？

sentences.english: Brush lightly on to the apples of your cheeks in an outward motion.
sentences.chinese: 由雙頰至鬢角輕刷於蘋果肌上。

sentences.english: I would like my hair cut shorter on the temples.
sentences.chinese: 兩邊的鬢角再剪短一點。

sentences.english: Pop-up trimmer for moustache and sideburns.
sentences.chinese: 彈出式修剪刀用於修剪長鬚和鬢角。

sentences.english: Well. I would like my hair cut shorter on the temples.
sentences.chinese: 額，兩邊的鬢角我想再剪短一點兒。

definition: to apply makeup to the eyebrows/(bird species of China) Chinese hwamei (Garrulax canorus)
to cut off/to interrupt/to prevent access
to move to and fro (with hand, foot, stick etc)/to fiddle with/to stir up
to have bright eyes and white teeth
